articles.description: The 36-year-old Sudo beat out runner-up Michelle Lesco, 38, by 14 dogs and buns. Sudo did not participate in last year's competition due to pregnancy
articles.content: Joey Chestnut won his fifteenth Nathan's Hot Dog Eating Contest by devouring 63 dogs in 10 minutes, despite taking the time to throw down an animal rights activists who barged onto the stage alongsid… [+6285 chars]
